title: Seen but not heard
creator_credit: Barbara A. Chobocky, New South Wales Film Corporation and Gillian Coote
brief_description: The International Year of the Child presented children with the opportunity to articulate their views on a variety of issues. Here they consider what their rights are, how they deal with them, and also how they resolve their grievances.
creator_credit_for_label: Barbara A. Chobocky, New South Wales Film Corporation and Gillian Coote
